channel.title: nmbazima.github.io
channel.description: Three thousand and odd things. The story begins here.

item.title: Microsoft Learn-A-thon Power Apps for Functional Consultants Challenge
item.description:
Microsoft Learn-a-thon: Power Apps for Functional Consultants Challenge

Learn Common Data Service, create apps by using Power Apps, manage using Power Automate; implement Power Virtual Agents chatbots; and integrate Power Apps with other apps and services.

Microsoft Learn-a-thon: Power Apps Challenge

item.title: Azure Developer League: Data Science and AI Challenge
item.description:
Azure Developer League: Data Science and AI Challenge

Learn the basics of data science and how to design and implement machine learning models in Azure.

Azure Developer League: Data Science and AI
